quotes.message: Unemployment insurance is a pre-paid vacation for freeloaders.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Unemployment is a great tragedy. The man who goes about hopelessly seeking work in order to earn bread for his children is a living reproach to civilization.
quotes.name: Carlos Saavedra Lamas

quotes.message: Of all aspects of social misery nothing is so heartbreaking as unemployment.
quotes.name: Jane Addams

quotes.message: The longer our graduation lines are today, the shorter our unemployment lines will be tomorrow.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: Unemployment diminishes people. Leisure enlarges them.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: If heaven really exists: then heaven is the job, hell is unemployment, while life is merely an interview.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: The cool thing about unemployment is every day is Saturday.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: Employment frees man from the nightmare of unemployment, while it chains him to his employer’s dream.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Unemployment or the loss of income which will always affect some in any society is certainly less degrading if it is the result of misfortune and not deliberately imposed by authority.
quotes.name: F.A. Hayek

quotes.message: There is no such thing as an acceptable level of unemployment, because hunger is not acceptable, poverty is not acceptable, poor health is not acceptable, and a ruined life is not acceptable.
quotes.name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.message: Inflation is the parent of unemployment and the unseen robber of those who have saved.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: Unemployment is like a headache or a high temperature – unpleasant and exhausting but not carrying in itself any explanation of its cause.
quotes.name: William Beveridge

quotes.message: Hunger is not the worst feature of unemployment; idleness is.
quotes.name: William E. Barrett

quotes.message: Unemployment, with its injustice for the man who seeks and thirsts for employment, who begs for labour and cannot get it, and who is punished for failure he is not responsible for by the starvation of his children – that torture is something that private enterprise ought to remedy for its own sake.
quotes.name: David Lloyd George

quotes.message: Unemployment is not the situation to blame your fate or on others… It’s time to believe in yourself and Unveil-New-Employment
quotes.name: Shashank Rayal

quotes.message: Computers can solve all kinds of problems except the unemployment problem they create
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Unemployment is bigger than a political party. It is a national danger and a national scandal.
quotes.name: Ellen Wilkinson

quotes.message: As long as there is unemployment, war, crime and all things that go to the infliction of man's inhumanity to man, regardless - there is much to be done, and people need to work together.
quotes.name: Rosa Parks

quotes.message: The trouble with unemployment is that the minute you wake up in the morning, you're on the job.
quotes.name: Slappy White

quotes.message: When more and more people are thrown out of work, unemployment results.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Long-term unemployment can make any worker progressively less employable, even after the economy strengthens.
quotes.name: Janet Yellen

quotes.message: We need to give importance to skill development because this way we can end unemployment.
quotes.name: Narendra Modi

quotes.message: The final solution for unemployment is work.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Unfortunately, very few governments think about youth unemployment when they are drawing up their national plans.
quotes.name: Kofi Annan

quotes.message: Everyone has the right to work, to free choice of employment, to just and favorable conditions of work and to protection against unemployment.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt
